name: Musculus
description:
🐀 Musculas is a puzzle game created for Wowie Jam #3, hosted by Jonas Tyroller. The game is puzzle platformer where you control mice and rats through logistic problems, where every time you restart the level, the previous rat continues along its path remembering what you did last time - with several bumps along the way. The game was made in three days, using Gamemaker Studio 1.4.

The game features time trial medals for extra completion, but can be played at any pace. Controlling one mouse at a time sounds easy enough, but the mistakes of your past will always reveal themselves and cause all kinds of shenanigans.

🐭

--------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

W - Jump

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

E - Spawn Mouse

Q - Spawn Rat

R - Reset Stage

ESC - Quit / Go Back

--------------------------------------------------------------

Credits: 

🐀 Stepford (Programmer / Artist)

🐀 SlickRamen (Programmer / Artist)

🐀RyanAvx (Music)

🐀 Sound Effects came from various free resource websites, and are legally free to use.
